description: Ihys was the brother and equal of Asmodeus. According to the Book of the Damned, he was one of the two primeval entities with his brother; together, they are known as the First. According to the Windsong Testaments, Ihys and his brother were two of the first eight deities of this incarnation of reality, born when Pharasma used the Seal to will existence into being.
name: Ihys
